title: BIO-Natural Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian and chicken on the menu (Feb 2016 update). Organic restaurant and ecological store. Menu includes pita sandwiches, salad, hummus, curry, quinoa, spirulina pasta, portobello, falafel, lentils, smoothies, amaranth horchata. Situated behind Quinta Alegr√≠a Mall by Scotiabank; previously located in a different location on Playa del Carmen at Calle 26 entre 5ta y 10 av.
